mapper.select: SELECT EMPLYR_SN, EMPLYR_ID, EMPLYR_PASSWORD, SALT, PASSWORD_ERROR_CO, LAST_CONECT_TRY_DT, ( CASE WHEN ROUND((sysdate - TO_DATE(LAST_CONECT_TRY_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) * 24 * 60, 0) < 10 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) AS LOCK_GBN, EMPLYR_MBTLNUM FROM TCM_EMPLYR WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{id}
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(EMPLYR_SN), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')||'000000')+1) AS EMPLYR_SN FROM TCM_EMPLYR WHERE EMPLYR_SN LIKE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') ||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCM_EMPLYR ( EMPLYR_SN, EMPLYR_NM, EMPLYR_ID, EMPLYR_PASSWORD, SALT, SEXDSTN_CODE, EMAIL_ADRES, EMPLYR_MBTLNUM, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT )VALUES( #{emplyrSn}, #{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{salt}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phoneNo}, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TCM_EMPLYR SET LAST_CONECT_TRY_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), PASSWORD_ERROR_CO = PASSWORD_ERROR_CO + 1 WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{emplyrId}
UPDATE TCM_EMPLYR SET LAST_CONECT_TRY_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), PASSWORD_ERROR_CO = 0 WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{emplyrId}
mapper.select: SELECT EMPLYR_MBTLNUM, '('||SUBSTR(EMPLYR_MBTLNUM, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(EMPLYR_MBTLNUM, 4, 1) ||'***-' || SUBSTR(EMPLYR_MBTLNUM, 8, 1) || '***' || ')' PHONE_NO, EMPLYR_ID FROM TCM_EMPLYR WHERE EMPLYR_SN = #{emplyrSn}
mapper.update:
UPDATE TCM_EMPLYR SET EMPLYR_PASSWORD = #{pw}, SALT = #{salt}
WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT EMPLYR_SN, EMPLYR_ID, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') FRST_REGIST_DT FROM TCM_EMPLYR WHERE EMPLYR_MBTLNUM = #{phoneNo}
